title: Anyone else getting a patcher stopped working error at this very moment?
body: I tried all the fixes that have been suggested in previous posts but none of them worked. I need some help

replies.body:
Don't worry, I can help!  You might have some overzealous security settings on your OS or anti-virus that's blocking the update.  Start out with our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure access is being allowed.

If the issue persists, toss me some more info and error.
None of the solutions seem to work, can installing the game in a pathway other than the one given when installed cause such a problem?

It could if the directory has strict settings, or if you're saving to a USB or external drive.  I want to help you out more but could use more info, like the exact error you're getting.  Working with the info I have, but I don't want to grasp at straws.  Let me know!
